content: I am going to try and use this topic to coordinate async fn in trait office hour topic selection
For my part, the main thing that happened was that we made the project board and I started work on stabilizing member constraints
i have to check on that, I think I almost got as far as opening a Pr but didn't quite get there
But I see some comments in #wg-traits > GATs tests, so perhaps there is some motion there =)

I think the next step from my end is to poke at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83190 -- I'm interested to know if there is someone who would like to work with me on that as a mentoring step.
yes, count with me to work with you on one
